room_title: Escape room "Licastro’s Lair" by Springfield Escape Room in Springfield (MO)
review: We escaped the Lair! We had a wonderful time. Definitely will return.

room_title: Escape room "Licastro’s Lair" by Springfield Escape Room in Springfield (MO)
review: We had a blast in the vampire themed room. Anything that has a creepy feel to it appeals to me anyway. Would be perfect for this fall as Halloween gets closer. I'm excited to go again and try a different story line. Lots of fun and laughs. Definitely puts your brains to work. Highly recommend!!!

room_title: Escape room "Licastro’s Lair" by Springfield Escape Room in Springfield (MO)
review: It's a total blast. The intensity is real. We screamed a bit.. we escaped though. Totally suggest the lair and the musician room.

room_title: Escape room "Licastro’s Lair" by Springfield Escape Room in Springfield (MO)
review: I had a special request, and the staff was very accommodating. They made my wedding proposal extra memorable. Licastro’s Lair was the theme of our room. Though we didn't "escape" we still had a blast in this fun and challenging room. I highly recommend you give them a shot. We'll definitely be back!
